movies.title: The Promise
movies.plot: Set during the last days of the Ottoman Empire, a love triangle develops between Mikael, a brilliant medical student, the beautiful and sophisticated artist Ana, and Chris, a renowned American journalist based in Paris.

events.title: Mikael Boghosian is sent to a prison labour camp
